question: Provide PMIDs supporting that BCR BCR::ABL1 Fusion AND ABL1 L384M confers resistance to Nilotinib.
cypher:
MATCH (v:Variant {name: 'BCR BCR::ABL1 Fusion AND ABL1 L384M'})-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Nilotinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Nilotinib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Nilotinib')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Larotrectinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Larotrectinib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Larotrectinib')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

MATCH (v:Variant {name: 'MYCN Amplification'})-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Sonidegib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Sonidegib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Sonidegib')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

MATCH (v:Variant {name: 'ERBB4 EXPRESSION'})-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Lapatinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Lapatinib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Lapatinib')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

question: Cite PubMed IDs showing BCR BCR::ABL1 Fusion AND ABL1 E255V causes resistance to Bosutinib.
cypher:
MATCH (v:Variant {name: 'BCR BCR::ABL1 Fusion AND ABL1 E255V'})-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Bosutinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Bosutinib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Bosutinib')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Thioguanine')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Thioguanine'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Thioguanine')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

MATCH (v:Variant {name: 'PTEN Mutation'})-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Taselisib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Taselisib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Taselisib')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

MATCH (v:Variant {name: 'BRAF V600E AND ARAF S490T'})-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Irinotecan')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Irinotecan'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Irinotecan')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Axitinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Axitinib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Axitinib')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Selpercatinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Selpercatinib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Selpercatinib')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Panitumumab')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Panitumumab'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Panitumumab')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

question: Give PMIDs for NRAS Q61K AND BRAF G466V-mediated resistance to Trametinib.
cypher:

WHERE (

MATCH (v:Variant {name: 'FLT3 ITD D651G'})-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Sorafenib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Sorafenib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Sorafenib')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Nilotinib')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100
